name: Astewwoids!!!
description:
It's Asteroids, but with a twist

This was the first game I made in GDevelop in 2019, I made it by following the Game Maker Studio tutorial and seeing how to do it in this other engine,  it was a fun experience

I first built the game in GD5, but for some reason it would always fail to export to executable, I then remade it in GD4 and thats the version avalible for download

I lost all the sprites and files for the game, this rar is all I had left
